SUBJECT: Re: Dear Donald,
Dear Donald,
 Thanks for your concern on my predicament and also for carrying out my
last wish for investment and charity projects, May God be with you.
I want you to stand as the beneficiary of the fund over there in your
country and distribute the fund to the charities as me and my late husband
agreed when he was alive AND I have decided that you will 25% and
distribute 75% to the charities and investment.
I am in the hospital at present taken treatment, therefore because of my
ugly situation i would like you to contact the banker Mr.Sim Tshabalala
because i have giving him all the papers related to this fund and i have
told him about you,
Below is the banker's contact details. You can call him on the phone
immediately you send him an email. He knows about you and his name is
Mr.Sim Tshabalala.
SEE THE BELOW CONTACTS
Contact person Ext 111 : MR. Sim Tshabalala
Mr.Sim Tshabalala
Chief Executive Director Forex Standard bank ,
Johannesburg
Tell Phone: +27-78-597 7116
Fax line : +27 86-610-3372
Email: Sim.Tshabalala@safrica.com
Please update me of your communication with the banker as soon as possible,
I count on you;
Thanks and may the Grace of our Lord almighty be with you.
Mrs.Sonja Smith
Cell 27 74 948 8653
